column5: Mildmay Sacred Heart School Salmon Release ends up to be a bigger day than they thought. Another successful School Salmon Release, Trout Hatchery Tour & Fish Kincardine Derby Student Weigh In Helpers, the Students were allowed to help weigh in a few Trout & Salmon & watch the guys clean them. Even asked what was in their Stomach & 1 of the Lake Trout had a few smelt & a Ling mostly digested.Thanx & Tight Lines SBK  http://lhfcschoolhatcheries.blogspot.ca/2014/05/mildmay-sacred-heart-junior-senior_6626.html
